com.fluidops.ajax.components

Class FTabPane2Lazy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fluidops.ajax.components.FComponent
      • com.fluidops.ajax.components.FContainer
        • com.fluidops.ajax.components.FTabPane2Lazy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FEventListener

    public class FTabPane2Lazy
extends FContainer
    This class realizes the server side of the tab pane with extended features. lazy loading caches the components on first load registers everything correctly cuts the link of old and adds a link to the new active tab content
    Author:
    tobias

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  FTabPane2Lazy.ComponentHolder
      This FTabPane2Lazy.ComponentHolder allows indirect access to the FComponents that actually represent the tab-content.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean enableClientSideTabCaching
      enables client side caching by storing its content in the DOM (underneath DIV with id FComponent.getId())

      • setEnableClientSideTabCaching

        public void setEnableClientSideTabCaching(boolean enableClientSideTabCaching)
        enables client side caching by storing the seen tabs' content in the DOM
        Parameters:
        enableClientSideTabCaching - - whether or not to use the client side cache
        See Also:
        enableClientSideTabCaching

      • jsURLs

        public java.lang.String[] jsURLs()
        use lazy tab components.values instead of getComponents() since inactive (= unregistered) tabs can be shown anytime without page refresh - js include is needed even if tab is not yet shown
        Overrides:
        jsURLs in class FComponent
        Returns:
        null if nothing is needed, the javascript source URL otherwise

      • render

        public java.lang.String render()
        Description copied from class: FContainer
        draw the HTML anchors of the kids - populate view will be triggered from the page since the components are all registered. The specific implementation should override this method since it only providers a very basic layout
